doc.description:
Digital Photo Camera Triggering (using a GPIO pin)
This module controls triggering of an attached external digital camera via one or more GPIO pins for on/off/shoot/zoom. It can trigger photos based on GPS distance, time or circle radius in both fixedwings and rotorcraft.

define.name: DC_SHOOT_ON_BUTTON_RELEASE
define.description: if defined, call dc_send_shot_postion on button release instead of on push

define.name: DC_ZOOM_IN_GPIO
define.description: optional, gpio to activate zoom in

define.name: DC_ZOOM_OUT_GPIO
define.description: optional, gpio to activate zoom out

define.name: DC_POWER_GPIO
define.description: optional, gpio to turn power on

define.name: DC_POWER_OFF_GPIO
define.description: optional, gpio to turn power off

define.name: DC_PUSH
define.description: specifies whether to set or clear gpio to push the shutter (default: gpio_set)

define.name: DC_RELEASE
define.description: specifies whether to set or clear gpio to release the shutter (default: gpio_clear)

define.name: DC_SHUTTER_DELAY
define.description: how long to push shutter in seconds

define.name: DC_POWER_OFF_DELAY
define.description: how long to send power off in seconds

define.name: DC_AUTOSHOOT_PERIOD
define.description: time period for DC_AUTOSHOOT_PERIODIC in seconds

define.name: DC_AUTOSHOOT_DISTANCE_INTERVAL
define.description: distance interval for DC_AUTOSHOOT_DISTANCE in meters

define.name: DC_AUTOSHOOT_SURVEY_INTERVAL
define.description: distance interval for DC_AUTOSHOOT_SURVEY in meters

define.name: DC_SHOT_SYNC_SEND
define.description: send DC_SHOT message when photo was taken (default: TRUE)
